languages.text: "Как такой обряд вообще возможен? Звучит как ересь!"
"How is a ritual like that even possible? It is akin to heresy!"
languages.original_text: "Как такой обряд вообще возможен? Звучит как ересь!"

traits.locale_text: "How is a ritual like that even possible? It sounds like heresy!"
"How is a ritual like that even possible? It sounds like heresy!"
"How is a ritual like that even possible? It sounds like heresy!"
"How is a ritual like that even possible? It sounds like heresy!"
"How is a ritual like that even possible? It is akin to heresy!"
"How is a ritual like that even possible? It is akin to heresy!"

languages.text: «¿Cómo es posible que exista un ritual así? ¡Es prácticamente herejía!».
languages.original_text: "How is a ritual like that even possible? It is akin to heresy!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo es posible que exista un ritual así? ¡Es prácticamente herejía!».

languages.text: 「そんな儀式が可能なのか？異端と同じではないか！」
languages.original_text: "How is a ritual like that even possible? It is akin to heresy!"

traits.locale_text: 「そんな儀式が可能なのか？異端と同じではないか！」

languages.text: “怎么会有这样的仪式？这简直就是异端恶行！”
languages.original_text: "How is a ritual like that even possible? It is akin to heresy!"

traits.locale_text: “怎么会有这样的仪式？这简直就是异端恶行！”

languages.text: "Wie ist ein solches Ritual überhaupt möglich? Das gleicht ja Ketzerei!"
languages.original_text: "How is a ritual like that even possible? It is akin to heresy!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie ist ein solches Ritual überhaupt möglich? Das gleicht ja Ketzerei!"

languages.text: « Comment un tel rituel est-il seulement envisageable ? Toute cette histoire sent l'hérésie à plein nez ! »
languages.original_text: "How is a ritual like that even possible? It is akin to heresy!"

traits.locale_text: « Comment un tel rituel est-il seulement envisageable ? Toute cette histoire sent l'hérésie à plein nez ! »

languages.text: "Böylesi bir ayin nasıl mümkün olabilir? Kâfirliği andırıyor!"
languages.original_text: "How is a ritual like that even possible? It is akin to heresy!"
